word_mean: 外倾〔性格〕者：兴趣外向，着重外部价值的人。同extravert

sentence.Network_en: I take it back, I think perhaps I am an extrovert.
sentence.Network_cn: 我收回说过的话，我想也许我是外向型的人。

sentence.Network_en: He was a showman, an extrovert who revelled in controversy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个爱出风头、性格外向而且喜欢争论的人。

sentence.Network_en: Sue is the extrovert in the family; opinionated, talkative and passionate about politics.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏是家中的外向行动派，性格固执，能说会道，而且对政治非常热衷。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 心理能力的走向：你是“外向（extrovert）”（Extrovert）（E）还是“内向”（Introvert）（I）？认识外在世界的方法：你是“感觉”（Sensing）（S） …
外向内向英文分别怎么说_百度知道 ... (性格)内向的- --introverted. 性格外向者- --extrovert 性格内向者- --introvert.
新编大学英语单词表(第四册) - 豆丁网 ... exterior a. 外部的， 外面的 extrovert n. 性格外向的人 extroverted a. 性格外向的.
沪江博客 - nanatumin的小窝 ... supremely 极为 extrovert 外向的人 clown 小丑,粗鲁愚蠢的人.

list.abs: Do you think you are introverted or extroverted ?, 你认为你自己性格内向还是外向?
什么意思_英语extroverted在线翻译... ... More extroverted 比较外向 extroverted loner 闭关中 extroverted learners 学习者.
extroverted character and good at communication ability .外向性性格和良好的沟通能力。
I consider myself to be pretty extroverted , without a need to constantly have a friend to talk to .我认为自己是非常外向的人,不需要有一个不变的朋友来倾诉,交流.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from extro- (variant of extra-, on the pattern of intro-) + Latin vertere 'to turn'

entry.def: Someone who is extrovert is very active, lively, and friendly.

means.word_mean: 1. (psychology) a person concerned more with practical realities than with inner thoughts and feelings

auth_sentence.content: The introvert gets angry; the extrovert feels hurt.
auth_sentence.res_content: The introvert gets angry; the extrovert feels hurt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The introvert gets angry; the extrovert feels hurt.

auth_sentence.content: They are extrovert histrionics posing as singular reckonings.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are extrovert histrionics posing as singular reckonings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are extrovert histrionics posing as singular reckonings.

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps there is an extrovert bias in your outlook on them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Perhaps there is an extrovert bias in your outlook on them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps there is an extrovert bias in your outlook on them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: extra以外,超过+curriculum课程表→adj.课外的
extra以外,超过+aneous……的→从外面来的
extra以外,超过+ordinary普通的→超出普通
extra以外,超过+solar太阳的→adj.太阳系以外的
extra以外,超过+vag漫游,走+ant……的→走得过分→奢侈的
extra以外,超过+violet紫色的→adj.紫外线的
extra以外,超过+vert转→[性格]向外转→外向
extra以外,超过+vert转→[性格]向外转→外向
extra以外,超过+polate放→放到[事实]外→推断

sentences.en: Extrovert prefer lively conversation to brood on the meaning of life.
sentences.cn: 性格外向的人喜欢高谈阔论，而不愿思索人生的意义。

sentences.en: She’s a good person to invite to a party because she’s such an extrovert.
sentences.cn: 最好把她邀来参加聚会,因为她很爱交际。
